<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gecko's Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=5640) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 26 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You cling to walls with a preternatural grip. You gain the [Combat Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=5134) feat as a bonus feat, and if you roll a success on an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to climb, you get a critical success instead.

**Special** If you have the [cliffscale lizardfolk heritage](/Heritages.aspx?ID=340), you instead gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.
name: Gecko's Grip
